topics.name: Linear Algebra – matrix operations, eigen‑decomposition, SVD
Probability & Statistics – distributions, Bayes theorem, hypothesis testing
Optimization Theory – convex sets, gradient descent, Lagrange multipliers
Information Theory – entropy, KL divergence, mutual information
Advanced Python – generators, context managers, type hinting, performance profiling
NumPy & Pandas Mastery – vectorized pipelines, time‑series handling, memory optimization
SQL & NoSQL for ML – complex joins, window functions, data versioning
Data Pipelines – Airflow basics, data validation with Great Expectations
Supervised Learning – bias‑variance trade‑off, regularization, ensemble methods (bagging, boosting)
Unsupervised Learning – clustering (DBSCAN, spectral), dimensionality reduction (t‑SNE, UMAP)
Model Evaluation & Selection – cross‑validation strategies, calibration, metrics for imbalanced data
Scikit‑Learn Deep‑Dive – custom transformers, pipeline engineering, hyperparameter optimization with Optuna
Neural Network Theory – back‑propagation math, initialization, activation functions
Convolutional Neural Networks – architecture design, transfer learning, segmentation basics
Recurrent & Attention Models – LSTM/GRU, transformer fundamentals, positional encoding
Framework Mastery – PyTorch advanced (custom autograd, distributed training) and TensorFlow 2.x
Training Tricks – learning‑rate schedules, mixed precision, gradient clipping, early stopping
Model Serialization & Serving – ONNX, TorchServe, TensorFlow Serving, FastAPI wrapper
MLOps Pipelines – CI/CD with GitHub Actions, Docker, Kubernetes, monitoring with Prometheus
Data Drift & Model Governance – drift detection, A/B testing, explainability with SHAP/LIME
Scalable Feature Stores – Feast, feature versioning, offline/online sync
Project 1 – End‑to‑end recommendation system (data ingestion → offline training → real‑time inference)
Project 2 – Vision application using self‑supervised learning on a custom dataset
Project 3 – Time‑series forecasting platform with automated retraining and alerting
Specialization Sprint – Choose one: NLP (large language models), Reinforcement Learning, or Graph Neural Networks
Portfolio Packaging – documentation, reproducible notebooks, GitHub repo, presentation deck
Linux command line deep dive (file systems, permissions, networking)
Version control best practices (Git branching, rebasing, hooks)
Fundamentals of networking for DevOps (TCP/IP, DNS, load balancing)
Introduction to Agile & SRE principles (SLIs, SLOs, error budgets)
Docker deep dive (multi‑stage builds, compose, security scanning)
Kubernetes essentials (pods, services, deployments, Helm charts)
Configuration management with Ansible (playbooks, vault, dynamic inventories)
Monitoring & logging stack (Prometheus, Grafana, Loki/ELK basics)
